function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Indoor air pollutants linked to mental conditions and negative feelings","Impact":"Decreased well-being and mental health of occupants","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation systems and air purification technologies","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building owners and designers"},{"Description":"Lack of spatial layout consideration impacting indoor air quality","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality and reduced well-being of occupants","Mitigation":"Incorporate spatial design considerations in building layout","Technologies":"Building design software, airflow simulation tools","People":"Building designers, architects","Owner":"Architects and building design professionals"},{"Description":"Ineffective promotion of social interactions in building design","Impact":"Decreased sociability and well-being of occupants","Mitigation":"Implement design decisions to promote social interactions and well-being","Technologies":"Community spaces, interactive design elements","People":"Building designers, architects","Owner":"Building owners and designers"}]}
